group_1.narration: On the week before Christmas,@Puella Care held a special campaign.
The purpose of said campaign involves Sudachi and@myself dressing as the "Three Wise Men of the East" and@providing free Coordinations to any Magical Girls@we meet in the city.
One such incident...@ended up being highly informative.

group_1.textRight: They're doing Coordinations for free!
Isn't that awesome, Emiri?!
What's wrong, Emiri?

group_1.textLeft: Even though we run a counseling center,@all we "do" is just that...
Is that okay...?@[chara:300651:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300651:motion_0][chara:300651:cheek_0][chara:300651:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]...No, it's totally not!

group_1.textRight: Eh - what about it?@I think it's fine as is...

group_1.textLeft: It sure as heck isn't!
Akiracchi, have you no pride?!

group_1.textRight: I-it's not that I don't, but...

group_1.textLeft: We gotta do something, too!

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, what should I do...?@Am I just giving a Coordination?

group_1.textLeft: Yep!
But after that comes the hospitality showdown!!

group_1.textRight: Hospitality showdown...?

group_1.textLeft: Righto!
A hospitality showdown between the trouble@counseling center and the Coordinator's!!

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not sure I understand, but I agree to it.
Now then, we will begin the Coordination.
Sudachi, if you'd please handle@this customer.
Fumu—!
...And I shall take care of this person.
Okay, thank you your cooperation.@The Coordinations have concluded.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:300850:cheek_0][chara:300850:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300850:lipSynch_1]Yeah, it's perfect, thanks!
So...the Coordination's done, which means...
It's my turn to provide service, huh...

group_1.textRight: What is it that I am supposed to do?

group_1.textLeft: We're the ones providing hospitality now,@so you don't have to do anything.
Though you know, I say hospitality,@but what am I supposed to do here...?

group_1.textRight: Chatting...perhaps?
Even as an Coordinator, it is quite an important@task to listen to what others have to say.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, good idea. Let's have a talk then,@Yozuru.
...Wait, I should be coming up with this@myself, shouldn't I...

group_1.textRight: What would you like to discuss?

group_1.textLeft: Let's see... Yozuru, is there anything@you, like...like?
You know, like hobbies!

group_1.textRight: ...If I had to say, it would be the minute@tasks I undertake.

group_1.textLeft: The minute...tasks...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, as I can forget everything and silently@become absorbed in them...

group_1.textLeft: H-Hmm...
(Wait, I'm in trouble if I leave it at that.@I need to open up here...)
I-I'm curious, do you have an example?

group_1.textRight: Let's see...there is the cooking...@Or perhaps the general housekeeping?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, then maybe you do sewing too?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I do not dislike it.
I did make parts of this costume.

group_1.textLeft: Woah, did you?
I wouldn't be surprised if you sold this@at a store...it's amazing!

group_1.textRight: Since the motif is of a distinguished@doctor from long ago,
I hoped to give it an honest@sense of dignity.

group_1.textLeft: It's definitely...dignified...@It makes me want to straighten myself up.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yozuru, you have a boyish side@to you,
but you're pretty girly, aren't you?@At least in the familial sense.
I'm not really good at that@sort of thing.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...it doesn't really suit me,@so I kinda admire that about you.

group_1.textRight: ...That isn't something you need@to worry about.
These days, "girlish" comes in@various forms.

group_1.textLeft: Th-thanks...
(Wait, I'm the one who's supposed to be hospitable,@I can't have her cheering me up...!)
(I need to bring this back around to a topic@Yozuru will enjoy...)

group_1.textRight: Besides...is this not fine?
(If I praise Miss Shinobu's attire and@mannerisms according to the memo...)
I believe you are quite girlish and lovely@enough as you are, Miss Shinobu.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300850:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: (That should be the correct word choice...)

group_1.textLeft: L-Lovely...@Mmmmmph...!!
I-I admit defeaaat!

group_1.textRight: Ehh—?!
Another error...@I've caused trouble once again...

group_1.narration: Even if I choose what to say in accordance@with the memo, depending on the circumstances@and company with whom I speak to,@mistakes are still a possibility.
I had learned this lesson through@a conversation with Miss Shinobu@over Christmas outfits...
